link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
formula: a(n+1) = trinomial(2*n+1, 3) = binomial(2*n+1, 3) + (2*n+1)*(2*n) = n*(2*n+1)*(2*n+5)/3, for n >= 0, with the trinomial irregular triangle A027907. a(n+1) = trinomial(2*n+1, 4*n-1), for n >= 1 (symmetry). a(n+1) = Integral_{x=0..2} (1/sqrt(4 - x^2))*(x^2 - 1)^(2*n+1)*R(4*(n-1), x)/Pi with the R polynomial coefficients given in A127672. [Comtet, p. 77, the integral formula for q=3, n -> 2*n+1, k = 3, rewritten with x = 2*cos(phi)]. The g.f. of {a(n+1)}_{n>= 0} is x*(7 + 2*x - x^2)/(1 - x)^4. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 19 2018
